page.title: 04H.M.S. CAMBRIDGE
page.content: H.M.S. Cambridge is a naval gunnery school commissioned in 1956. It is now the only naval gunnery school in the U.K, taking some 4,500 trainees in 1986. The basic training course lasts six weeks. The guns fire 6 times a day Tuesday to Friday and sometimes there are night exercises. The small arms range is used by both Police and the Army. There are over 100 officers and men on permanent duty and 45 civilians. An all-weather hockey pitch, a swimming pool, gym, squash court, tennis court, skittle alley and golf course and a .22 range were all made by self-help. 150 R.N.students a week train here. { { { {
